hints.text:
A seaside town famed for film shots and a giant 
monolith rising from the surf.

You’ll see tufted puffin nesting signs in spring and 
summer around tidepools.

Face the 235-foot sea stack; your spot is where the 
basalt meets low-tide starfish.

A cliff-top beacon between Florence and Yachats that 
guards a sweeping cove.

Climb toward the keeper’s house; gulls circle and the 
beam sweeps the trees.

Stand by the white tower railing—listen for the horn 
and watch the Fresnel lens.

A dramatic sinkhole on black lava rock that inhales and 
explodes with the tide.

Follow the Spouting Horn signs; salty spray mists the 
viewpoint.
